abilities.name: One of Those Days
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from a desperate roll, or to escape from whatever (or to wherever) you want... for now.

abilities.name: Now! Now! Now!
abilities.description: When you push yourself, you may spend +1 Grit (so 3 Grit total) to gain both +1 effect and +1d instead of one or the other.

abilities.name: Didn't See that Coming
abilities.description: When you make a surprising move that disregards propriety or other convention, you get +1d or +1 effect (your choice, as appropriate).

abilities.name: Daredevil
abilities.description: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.description: You gain an additional XP trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your Posse helped you get payback, also mark Posse XP.

abilities.name: Some Fine Reputation
abilities.description: Entering a location you may tell us what the people have heard about you. When you reveal your name and exploit your reputation you gain improved position or +1 effect (whatever makes sense).

abilities.name: Blaze of Glory
abilities.description: When you mark a Stigma and utter a dying malediction you may retaliate against any and all enemies within range. Say how you bring ruin to your foes before they take you down. You may mark a Stigma prematurely to use this ability.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

contacts.name: a Friend you still owe money
